trends: There has been one other sighting in Menasha
There were no other sightings in Menasha on or around June 17th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsWalking and seen that a really dark storm was moving in. Looking up at the clouds and the storm moving in I seen Chrome ball about the size of basketball hovering about 150 feet from me above houses right before storm. Object then moved very slowly away then vanished. Took a few pictures on my cell phone.
Summary: Seen right before storm chrome ball hovering then moving slowly
